OrgName.entry: SHEFFIELD CHILDREN AND YOUNG PEOPLES SERVICE

Desc.entry: Sheffield City Council service offering both statutory and non-statutory educational opportunities across the city in schools. Services provided include: planning of education and provision of places; admission to schools; assessment and placement of children with special needs; Rosponsibility for the delivery of social care services for children in need including those at risk of harm or offending, in need of accomondation and children with learning difficultied and disabilities; zero fares passes for children and post-16 students.

DisabledAccess.entry: Changing Places Toilet available in this building
